::Prowl:;

Prowl smiles, returning the salute.

"Nope, I'm not commander. Iron Raptor is," he says, his eyes 
softening at the mention of his lover's name. "I can take you to her 
if you want."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> "It dosent matter" responds Firedrill, towards Prowl not being 
> related in any way, "Youve saved my life, but whats more 
> important, my friends. I will be in your debt" he then thinks for a 
> second, and salutes Prowl, "Are you the robot in Command?"
